data.description: Foreign language course taken on a Madison resident study abroad program in a language not taught at UW-Madison. Does not award retrocredit. Current enrollment in a UW-Madison study abroad program and prior approval by IAP in consultation with a related foreign language department. Enrollment in this course presumes students have completed a first-semester course in the language or placed directly into the course.
data.title: SECOND SEMESTER FOREIGN LANGUAGE
